title: Who is Shehnaaz Gill, and why is she trending on Twitter? - Quora

response.answer_text: Also called Sana in the Bigg Boss house,.Shehnaz was born in Beas, Amritsar to a Sikh family. Shehnaz is a popular face from the Punjab industry. She has a huge fan following in the film industry. She has more than 1.5 millions fans on Instagram.Some facts about her life are:  Shehnaz is 26 years old and she stepped into the Punjabi film industry in the year 2015. She first featured in the song Shiv Di Kitaab which was sung by Gurvinder Brar. Shehnaz Gill rose to fame with Garry Sandhu's song Yeah Baby, Majhe Di Jatti with Kanwar Chahal and Guri's song Yaari. After Shehnaz entered the Big Boss house, her music video Veham released. The song has crossed more than 20 million views on Youtube. Shehnaz can be seen in a totally different avatar in the song. Just like other contestants, Shehnaaz too managed to grab a lot of attention with her antics and especially her alleged brewing romance with TV hottie Sidharth Shukla. Shehnaz was first seen on the big screen with the movie Kala Shah Kala. The movie also starred Sargun Mehta and Binu Dhillon. Shehnaz completed her studies from Lovely Professional University in Punjab. She is a graduate in Commerce. She got enrolled for Bachlor in commerce at Lovely Professional University. However, in an unseen Bigg Boss video, she had revealed that she did not complete her studies and left college in the third year. Shenaz AKA Punjab Ki Katrina Kaif got into a controversy after she publicly made fun of Himanshi Khurana's song I Like It. Himanshi Khurana too is a popular face of Punjab industry. The Punjabi hottie is also a self-proclaimed fitness freak and her Instagram account is proof where she keeps sharing glimpses from her workout sessions. Shehnaz Gill's new music video, crooned by Tony Kakkar is here. The track, titled Kurta Pajama, shows Shehnaz Gill in a dreamy world, which can be seen through the kaala (black) kurta pajama.The song has crossed 100 million views on you tube.

Shehnaaz Kaur Gill is an Indian actress, model and singer, who predominantly works in Punjabi film and music Industry. Gill started her career as a model, starring in various songs like Shiv Di Kitaab and Majhe Di Jatti. She made her Punjabi film debut with supporting roles in the romantic comedies Kala Shah Kala and Daaka. She is Famous in India with name 'Punjab Ki Katrina Kaif ' .She is currently seen participating in the reality show Bigg Boss 13. This was followed by release of her debut song "Veham". She is trending as her song with Tony Kakkar crossed 100 million views. Shehnaaz Gill-Tony Kakkar starrer Kurta Pajama hits 100 million, fans trend #KurtaPajamaHits100M
